title: "Sondrel's SFA 100 IP platform for intelligence gathering chips at the Edge"
excerpt: "Designed to be the solution for an AI compute device right at the Edge, Sondrel’s new SFA 100 IP reference platform makes creating high-performance, battery-powered IoT devices easy and fast. The design has an onboard Arm® CPU to locally process data gathered from its associated sensors for onward transmission via wire or wireless connection for further analysis."
